Warm, cozy and nice for fall photos. True to size.
This was a gift for my great grand son, the shirt paired perfect with his denim coveralls
I received a used shirt that was wadded into a bag and has stains on it.

Love it

My son picked this out to wear to Thanksgiving and I swear it’s soft enough to wear as pajamas. The colors are vibrant and it washed well with little amount of wrinkles. Definitely a great value for the price.

My boys got nice compliments. The fit and quality of the shirt was a heavy cotton Oxford. My kids only like comfort and this shirt was a great buy and will be recycled for Christmas photos under red and green sweaters.

My son wears size 7 and the 7 fit perfectly.  Fabric is flannel-like material but thinner than actual flannel.  Not really worth the price but it was cute for Thanksgiving.  Would also be cute for Fall/school pictures.  Photographs well.
I am happy with the purchase, the quality of the shirts pleased me, after washing they are normal, nothing has changed. I recommend

My sons LOVES this. He's so sad that they don't have the snap style in other color options. It washes well. True to size.
Super cute thick shirt

We got the size 7 for our almost 8yo, who is taller for his age, and it fit a little loose, but mostly just really long (as you can see in the picture) not a big deal if you're tucking it in, but looks a little off. Fabric is a bit stiff. Price was good for what we needed it for.
True to size.  My son is 6 and the 6 fit perfectly.  It is excellent quality. Decently warm he said also. Washed well also

Well, after washing your shirt for a few times, noticed the sleeves were starting to fall apart. Now it’s time to get out the needle and thread. This shirt is soft and great quality! We used this for a field trip and it worked out perfectly. I would definitely have him wear this again.  For reference, my son is 9 and we ordered the size 8. Fit perfectly.

I purchased a size 3T for my toddler and this plaid button up did not disappoint. The material is nice, soft, and is not thin (not too thick either). Everything about this button up is exactly as advertised.
Love the colors and material used in this shirt. Looks great on my son! Very pleased with the quality and that it was true to size.
